attributes.action: Get David Cameron to Resign as Prime Minister
attributes.background: David Cameron has finally admitted he benefited from a Panama-based offshore trust set up by his late father. After days of staling and lying he confessed that he owned shares in the tax haven fund, which he sold for £31,500 just before becoming prime minister in 2010. He needs to resign after this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister or any other Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
